LABEL: 0x1B3
STRING: Leaving Hikari in the emergency room, Hiragino and I headed to the lobby.

LABEL: 0x1F1
STRING: We ended up talking for a while, but I wondered how the cooking was going――

LABEL: 0x2AC
STRING: ――And at that moment, the scene of this morning's meal came to my mind.

LABEL: 0x316
STRING: ...This was bad.

LABEL: 0x330
STRING: No, not that cooking itself was bad, well, maybe it was, but...

LABEL: 0x388
STRING: Leaving it in the hands of the women of <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x530
STRING: 「Ah, you two are late.」

LABEL: 0x562
STRING: 「We're all ready to go.」

LABEL: 0x59B
STRING: Yukari and Tokiwa greeted us in the lobby.

LABEL: 0x6A1
STRING: As well as Touri and... Reiri.

LABEL: 0x6C7
STRING: I see, so Reiri had joined in as well...

LABEL: 0x6F5
STRING: The dishes made by these shocking members were lined up in front of us.

LABEL: 0x778
STRING: 「Oh, it looks good... Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x7CB
STRING: I couldn't say a thing.

LABEL: 0x7EB
STRING: The food on the table in front of me looked extravagant.

LABEL: 0x827
STRING: No, it should have looked extravagant.

LABEL: 0x8E1
STRING: What a sad state of affairs.

LABEL: 0x903
STRING: How did it end up like this?

LABEL: 0x931
STRING: The food wasn't charred or murky brown, to give you an example.

LABEL: 0x981
STRING: It looked delicious, colorful, and vibrant while not exhibiting any magical colors.

LABEL: 0x9F1
STRING: What should have been truly delicious dishes, but...

LABEL: 0xACB
STRING: They were... ingeniously put together as if ignoring gravity.

LABEL: 0xB17
STRING: Forks, knives, and other tableware were flaunting their presence as well, making them look like acrobatically constructed modern art pieces.

LABEL: 0xBE7
STRING: 「What do you think?!」

LABEL: 0xC0A
STRING: Tokiwa's chest puffed with pride.

LABEL: 0xC28
STRING: ...It was you.

LABEL: 0xC42
STRING: So you were the one with this sense of style.

LABEL: 0xC90
STRING: Hiragino was speechless.

LABEL: 0xCAC
STRING: Yukari, who was trying to get through this with gusto, was also averting her gaze.

LABEL: 0xCF2
STRING: What was this?

LABEL: 0xD0C
STRING: It was sad because each of the dishes looked tasty in their own right.

LABEL: 0xD75
STRING: 「...Come on, you two, let's eat right away.」

LABEL: 0xDB2
STRING: At Yukari's urging, I sat down on the sofa.

LABEL: 0xDEC
STRING: My eyes met with Hiragino's.

LABEL: 0xEB3
STRING: Wordlessly, we looked down at the meals in front of us.

LABEL: 0xEE7
STRING: That's right. What we needed was courage.

LABEL: 0xF19
STRING: Take the first step―and once you do, keep on going.

LABEL: 0xF7B
STRING: Re-evaluate reality once more.

LABEL: 0xFAB
STRING: The dishes were lined up in front of us, each one transformed into modern art by Tokiwa's hands.

LABEL: 0x1003
STRING: Compared to this morning, they looked decent.

LABEL: 0x105D
STRING: By appearance alone, they looked delicious.

LABEL: 0x1095
STRING: However... I wouldn't be fooled by appearances anymore.

LABEL: 0x10D1
STRING: My tongue remembered.

LABEL: 0x10EF
STRING: The tragedy from this morning――

LABEL: 0x1233
STRING: But I couldn't stay like this forever.

LABEL: 0x126D
STRING: My arm moved slowly.

LABEL: 0x128B
STRING: I picked some of the food with my fork...

LABEL: 0x12B9
STRING: And took a bite.

LABEL: 0x12F1
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x13A2
STRING: 「...Is it good?」

LABEL: 0x142E
STRING: 「...Seems like it.」

LABEL: 0x1451
STRING: Oh my god...

LABEL: 0x1473
STRING: Our sense of taste was already destroyed...

LABEL: 0x14B1
STRING: Their cooking was super delicious.

LABEL: 0x14DB
STRING: Despair assailed me.

LABEL: 0x1533
STRING: I looked up and saw a girl smiling brightly at me.

LABEL: 0x15D3
STRING: 「See? It really is delicious, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x1603
STRING: 「It's all thanks to Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x162A
STRING: 「Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x165C
STRING: Did she drug us? ...It would be rude to imagine that.

LABEL: 0x16A4
STRING: When I looked at Reiri, she quickly averted her eyes.

LABEL: 0x16DC
STRING: Flabbergasted as I was, Yukari started explaining with visible difficulty.

LABEL: 0x17E9
STRING: 「You see...」

LABEL: 0x1803
STRING: 「Reiri-san gave us instructions.」

LABEL: 0x189F
STRING: 「It was just like in the wheelhouse earlier.」

LABEL: 0x1928
STRING: 「She was like, "That goes there, and this goes here!" All we did was follow her precise instructions.」

LABEL: 0x19E6
STRING: 「Well, I was the one who put together the servings.」

LABEL: 0x1A21
STRING: No way... I had thought that adding Reiri to the mix would lead to something even worse.

LABEL: 0x1A6B
STRING: Who would have thought that their cooking would improve so dramatically?

LABEL: 0x1AB3
STRING: This wasn't even about being an MVP.

LABEL: 0x1AD8
STRING: She had single-handedly overturned a power gap so great that it wasn't even a contest to begin with.

LABEL: 0x1B71
STRING: 「Yes, it's delicious. You must be a good cook, Reiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x1BB2
STRING: Hiragino complimented her with a big smile.

LABEL: 0x1BDA
STRING: Still averting her eyes, Reiri snorted in a bored manner.

LABEL: 0x1C8C
STRING: 「Hmph! Look, doctor. I'm not a great cook or anything.」

LABEL: 0x1CD6
STRING: 「There's just something wrong with these guys.」

LABEL: 0x1D02
STRING: 「...Anyone can cook as long as they follow a recipe.」

LABEL: 0x1D40
STRING: 「I just can't stand deviating even a milligram from it.」

LABEL: 0x1D8C
STRING: Her mocking tone of voice was the same as usual, but was she trying to hide her embarrassment by looking away?

LABEL: 0x1DF6
STRING: Still, anyone could cook as long as they followed a recipe, huh?

LABEL: 0x1E36
STRING: It must've been tough being forced to cook with people who couldn't do even that...

LABEL: 0x1E8C
STRING: In that sense, did she actually make all of these by herself?

LABEL: 0x1FB0
STRING: 「Hmm... But as long as you get the seasoning right, it's usually fine.」

LABEL: 0x2013
STRING: 「Like I said! Don't talk about astronomy and ecology with such messy thoughts. Cooking is chemistry.」

LABEL: 0x2124
STRING: 「No, it's art.」

LABEL: 0x21D6
STRING: Reiri's fists trembled.

LABEL: 0x2200
STRING: Blue veins appeared on her already-strained slender arms.

LABEL: 0x2234
STRING: I've had this thought for a while now, but could it be that Reiri was a bad match against Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x228C
STRING: She ended up taking all of Tokiwa's remarks seriously, however incoherent they were.

LABEL: 0x22EC
STRING: Every time they talked, Reiri looked exhausted.

LABEL: 0x2320
STRING: But the fact that she could talk to her to the point of exhaustion

LABEL: 0x236E
STRING: while making light jokes probably meant that they had grown closer.

LABEL: 0x23B2
STRING: It was no exaggeration to say that Reiri, who had achieved her goal of extracting information beyond human knowledge from <COOS> by utilizing <Alice>,

LABEL: 0x241A
STRING: was now our most reliable companion.

LABEL: 0x24A1
STRING: 「Now then, let's have some too!」

LABEL: 0x24D4
STRING: At Yukari's command, everyone sat down to eat.

LABEL: 0x250C
STRING: Everyone's chopsticks were clearly moving faster than they had this morning.

LABEL: 0x2544
STRING: ...Wait, did she use us as a poison taster?

LABEL: 0x258A
STRING: Seeing how everyone was devouring their food made me doubt it.

LABEL: 0x26A7
STRING: 「Hey, now that we're all here, let's talk about something interesting!」

LABEL: 0x26F8
STRING: 「You mean――」

LABEL: 0x2786
STRING: 「Ghost stories.」

LABEL: 0x27A7
STRING: ...I felt like I could've seen this coming.

LABEL: 0x282A
STRING: As if he'd been waiting for this very moment, the man sitting next to me opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x28EA
STRING: 「There was a ghost ship discovered in the Atlantic Ocean in the 19th century...」

LABEL: 0x292F
STRING: 「A ghost ship?!」

LABEL: 0x2950
STRING: Touri overreacted to Hiragino's dramatic tone.

LABEL: 0x2992
STRING: The word "ghost ship" evoked an image of a rotting sailboat floating in the fog.

LABEL: 0x2A9C
STRING: 「The ship they found was called Mary Celeste.」

LABEL: 0x2AD6
STRING: 「There was no crew on board at the time of discovery.」

LABEL: 0x2B0A
STRING: 「The table still had warm tea and breakfast on it.」

LABEL: 0x2B44
STRING: 「Upon further examination, the ship's compass had been destroyed, and the sextant and chronometer were missing.」

LABEL: 0x2B9F
STRING: There was no way to measure space, time, or anything.

LABEL: 0x2BD3
STRING: Isolated, the ship continued to drift on the sea.

LABEL: 0x2C21
STRING: 「Most of that's just fiction, right? I don't think there are any historical records of the details.」

LABEL: 0x2C83
STRING: Hiragino readily nodded his head.

LABEL: 0x2CBA
STRING: 「It's true that the Mary Celeste incident was often the subject of fiction.」

LABEL: 0x2D00
STRING: 「The author of Holmes, Conan Doyle, was one of them.」

LABEL: 0x2D4B
STRING: 「Oh, so they just made stuff up?」

LABEL: 0x2D82
STRING: Touri breathed a sigh of relief.

LABEL: 0x2DB3
STRING: 「But the fact is that all of the crew was missing.」

LABEL: 0x2DEB
STRING: 「It's also true that the compass was destroyed, and that the sextant and chronometer were missing.」

LABEL: 0x2E75
STRING: The Mary Celeste.

LABEL: 0x2E97
STRING: A ghost ship that had lost its compass and was lost at sea.

LABEL: 0x2FCE
STRING: 「Captain Morehouse of the Dei Gratia discovered the Mary Celeste.」

LABEL: 0x3020
STRING: 「Apparently, he was a friend of the captain of the Mary Celeste.」

LABEL: 0x3065
STRING: Yukari joined in on Hiragino's story.

LABEL: 0x308D
STRING: Mary Celeste was found by Dei Gratia.

LABEL: 0x313F
STRING: 「――Captain Morehouse would regret it for the rest of his life.」

LABEL: 0x3189
STRING: 「What if the compass had been pointing in the direction of the Mary Celeste from the start?」

LABEL: 0x31F9
STRING: 「They could have been there before they all disappeared.」

LABEL: 0x323E
STRING: That slight delay had cost many lives.

LABEL: 0x3272
STRING: Just like this submarine.

LABEL: 0x329C
STRING: Everyone stopped eating and was immersed in sentimentality.

LABEL: 0x32D4
STRING: In the midst of all that, there was one girl who looked puzzled.

LABEL: 0x3377
STRING: 「...You all are pretty naive, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x33B3
STRING: 「If it were me... yes. I'd be surprised if Morehouse didn't dispose of the crew himself and then take the ship back to port.」

LABEL: 0x3474
STRING: 「I can't help but think that he was just spouting all that crazy crap to cover it up.」

LABEL: 0x34E5
STRING: Reiri then took a sip of water, showing no signs of guilt.

LABEL: 0x3536
STRING: 「A compass――」

LABEL: 0x35AF
STRING: 「Right, speaking of compasses, here――」

LABEL: 0x35E6
STRING: As he spoke, Hiragino pulled out a necklace from his pocket.

LABEL: 0x362C
STRING: It had a silver chain, and at the end of it was――

LABEL: 0x3680
STRING: 「――Hey! Where did you find that?!」

LABEL: 0x36BC
STRING: 「Ah, sorry. I forgot to give this to you.」

LABEL: 0x374D
STRING: 「It's yours, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x37AD
STRING: A small medal was attached to the end of the chain.

LABEL: 0x37DF
STRING: It was a pendant with an old British silver coin motif.

LABEL: 0x381B
STRING: Hiragino gently turned the plate over on his palm.

LABEL: 0x385B
STRING: The words "To Hitose" were engraved there.

LABEL: 0x3898
STRING: It was the pendant I went out of my way to retrieve from my luggage in the rear section yesterday.

LABEL: 0x38E6
STRING: I didn't have time to put it on, so I had kept it in my pocket...

LABEL: 0x399A
STRING: 「I found this in the emergency room yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x3A37
STRING: 「I forgot all about it until now... Sorry for bringing it up in front of everyone.」

LABEL: 0x3A8E
STRING: 「No, it's fine. Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x3ABA
STRING: I took the pendant from his hand and examined it.

LABEL: 0x3AF2
STRING: There was no doubt about it... This was mine.

LABEL: 0x3B1C
STRING: It wasn't majorly damaged, either.

LABEL: 0x3B42
STRING: Thank goodness... Really.

LABEL: 0x3BD0
STRING: 「...Was it a gift to your sister, perhaps?」

LABEL: 0x3C09
STRING: 「...It was.」

LABEL: 0x3C23
STRING: 「It was for her birthday seven years ago. I made it because I wanted to give it to her once she returned from the sea.」

LABEL: 0x3C8B
STRING: The words "To Hitose" were carved in a thin line over the silhouette of Queen Victoria.

LABEL: 0x3CF6
STRING: Looking back, it was childish and had no sense of style.

LABEL: 0x3D3A
STRING: However, at the time, I was very enthusiastic about choosing an accessory for an older girl, even if she was my sister.

LABEL: 0x3DAE
STRING: I still remembered that moment.

LABEL: 0x3E9C
STRING: 「I was worried about what to give as a birthday present for her...」

LABEL: 0x3EE6
STRING: 「I searched all over the place, and suddenly I found this silver coin.」

LABEL: 0x3F2C
STRING: 「It has a portrait of the Queen on the front, and on the back is an engraved cross.」

LABEL: 0x3F88
STRING: 「This cross... For some reason, at the time I thought it was like a compass pointing me in the right direction.」

LABEL: 0x3FEC
STRING: 「I thought this would make a great gift for her...」

LABEL: 0x4034
STRING: In reality, it wasn't a compass but a cross.

LABEL: 0x407A
STRING: The solemn image of the Queen and the compass-like cross seemed like the perfect charm for my sister, who worked at sea.

LABEL: 0x4124
STRING: ――This...

LABEL: 0x413E
STRING: If I could have given it to her before the accident, would it have protected her...?

LABEL: 0x4200
STRING: ...That was impossible.

LABEL: 0x4222
STRING: No amount of "what ifs" could change the past.

LABEL: 0x426C
STRING: This was a pendant I had carried with me everywhere I went.

LABEL: 0x42FF
STRING: But now that I knew that she was able to die properly in this sea,

LABEL: 0x434F
STRING: I couldn't keep dwelling on it like I had in the past.

LABEL: 0x4395
STRING: I, too, had to change.

LABEL: 0x43C3
STRING: To do so, we had to first get out of this sea.

LABEL: 0x449F
STRING: ――Then, a hand reached out from my side and snatched the pendant.

LABEL: 0x4549
STRING: 「A portrait of the Queen and a compass, huh? The young Katagiri was quite clingy, wasn't he?」

LABEL: 0x4590
STRING: 「Oh, shut up. It was youthful indiscretion.」

LABEL: 0x4624
STRING: 「You bought it a long time ago, but you've been carrying it around with you until now, haven't you? You've got a cute side to you, boy.」

LABEL: 0x4699
STRING: 「I get it, I get it! Stop!」

LABEL: 0x46C7
STRING: Was she a bully?

LABEL: 0x46ED
STRING: Reiri smiled cheerfully.

LABEL: 0x470F
STRING: She really did have a bad personality.

LABEL: 0x474B
STRING: Just as I managed to snatch the pendant back, another hand was held out toward me.

LABEL: 0x4803
STRING: 「Could you show it to me, if you don't mind?」

LABEL: 0x4842
STRING: 「Sure... it's not that big of a deal.」

LABEL: 0x48E8
STRING: 「No. I'm sure Hitose would be happy to hear what you said.」

LABEL: 0x492B
STRING: As I thought about my sister's life at ROMLES that I didn't know about, Yukari spoke.

LABEL: 0x4973
STRING: If she said so, then maybe it was true... I found myself a little relieved, even without any evidence to support it.

LABEL: 0x4A4F
STRING: 「Oh, this is――」

LABEL: 0x4A71
STRING: 「...What a strange coincidence.」

LABEL: 0x4A9C
STRING: Yukari, who was rolling the coin around on the palm of her hand, narrowed her eyes like she had noticed something.

LABEL: 0x4AEE
STRING: She grabbed the small coin between her fingers and held it up in front of her, staring at it as if to confirm it.

LABEL: 0x4B4C
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0x4BF6
STRING: 「...This is a silver coin commonly known as "Godless Florin."」

LABEL: 0x4C38
STRING: 「Godless... The reason why it's called that is because of the letters usually carved into these coins.」

LABEL: 0x4C96
STRING: 「What letters?」

LABEL: 0x4CBD
STRING: 「It's missing the words that the other coins have―"Dei Gratia."」

LABEL: 0x4D14
STRING: Dei Gratia―by the grace of God.

LABEL: 0x4D72
STRING: A compass devoid of God's grace would lead you to the worst possible abyss,

LABEL: 0x4D9A
STRING: no matter how much you trusted the direction it pointed you in, and no matter how many right choices you made.

LABEL: 0x4E02
STRING: Yes... Just like the current <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x4E57
STRING: A strange coincidence.

LABEL: 0x4E71
STRING: Silence fell between us.

LABEL: 0x4E8B
STRING: In the dark of night...

LABEL: 0x4F13
STRING: ...The silver coin was shining dully.
